Package business.manager.adventure

Class AdventureManager

java.lang.Object
business.manager.adventure.AdventureManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdventureFacade
public class AdventureManager extends Object implements AdventureFacade
This class manages adventures and provides methods for retrieving and persisting adventure data.

      public List<String> rollInitiatives(List<Character> party, Map<Monster,Integer> encounterMonsters, List<Character> characterInitiatives, List<Monster> monsterInitiatives)
      Rolls initiatives for the party characters and encounter monsters.
      Specified by:
      rollInitiatives in interface AdventureFacade
      Parameters:
      party - the list of characters in the party
      encounterMonsters - a map containing encounter monsters and their quantities
      characterInitiatives - the list to store character initiatives
      monsterInitiatives - the list to store monster initiatives
      Returns:
      a list of strings representing the merged initiatives of characters and monsters
